configurations.name: Listen for XDebug
configurations.port_comment: Make sure port is set to the same value of xdebug.client_port in your xdebug.ini file
configurations.hostname_comment: Important! 0.0.0.0 is the address to bind when listening for xDebug. 0.0.0.0 means `host.docker.internal` which should be the value to use in xdebug.ini for the xdebug.client_host key
configurations.stopOnEntry_comment: When true, the debugger will halt on the first PHP instruction that is being fired. Just like if a breakpoint was manually put on that line in the code
